attributes.action: To periodically run random drugs & mental capability tests on MPs & Peers.
attributes.background: MPs, in both Houses, especially those in the government are in charge of people's lives & livelihoods. Charged with such a responsibility, it is essential that public is assured and is confidant that all decisions are made without being influenced by narcotics and are made while in sound mind.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105070

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
